title: The Sound 4 Missions
description: The sound 4 are part of the Sound village. They are Orochimaru's strongest team. With the following missions you are able to unlock Jiroubou, Kidoumaru, Tayuya and Sakon.

title: Serve untill death missions
description: Many ninja have the goal of serving their superior. Are you able to serve untill death? With these missions you are able to unlock Zabuza, Kimimaro, Kabuto and Shizune.

title: The four teamleaders missions
description: After the genins are able to finish a A-Rank mission, their teamleader will help and fight along with them. With these missions you are able to unlock Kakashi, Gai, Kurenai and Asuma.

title: The legendary four missions
description: The legendary sannins are the strongest ninjas raised in Konoha using huge Summons. With these missions you are able to unlock Jiraiya, Tsunade, Orochimaru and Sandaime.
